page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: At the present time most Primary Education is based on a thematic system. Once a theme is decided upon for the class to study eg local environment the teacher must ensur that the children,through the theme cover several areas of the curriculum. With in the theme children will uses many research skills to find out about their environment such as map skills,interviewing,reporting,mathemat ical analysis. These skills are of great interest to the children as they are learnt for a particular purpose ie their thematic study. By the end of a school year all aspects of the curriculum eg.maths,science,language,geography,hi story,physical education,drama and art should have been covered at the childs ability and through the theme.
